profile: Passionate Full Stack Web Developer, I design high-performance and scalable web applications using Angular and Spring Boot. I have worked on complex projects such as Stripe integration and user experience (UX) optimization with NgRx. Expert in TypeScript, Java, REST APIs, and Keycloak, I master both front-end and back-end to create robust solutions. Familiar with Agile environments, I conduct code reviews and support my colleagues, fostering collaboration and product quality.

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Systems and Software

projects.name: Retail Banking Hub – BIAT
projects.team: Business Analyst, 3 Developers, Tech Lead, Tester
projects.description: Design of an intelligent platform enhancing customer relationships and increasing commercial performance by 15%.
responsibilities: Structured the Angular project using a scalable and modular architecture
Integrated Spring Boot REST APIs and optimized UX/UI standards
Performed manual and regression testing to ensure functional validation

projects.name: BIAT Capital Risque
projects.team: Business Analyst, 2 Developers, Tech Lead, Tester
projects.description: Development of a digital platform to manage BIAT's venture capital investments. The tool tracks investments, analyzes the performance of funded startups, and facilitates portfolio management, while improving transparency and fund management efficiency.
responsibilities: Structured the Angular project for a modular and maintainable architecture
Implemented business logic with Spring Boot for high-performance REST APIs
Designed and developed interfaces with HTML, CSS, TypeScript
Created reusable components (buttons, forms, modals...)
Conducted system and regression testing after bug fixes
Debugged, improved, and maintained the code

Structured the Angular project to optimize source code management
Implemented business logic with Spring Boot for high-performance REST APIs
Designed and developed responsive interfaces with HTML, CSS, TypeScript

Conducted system and regression testing
Debugged, improved, and maintained the application post-production
